channel.title: Change rights does not work
channel.description:
1. i change the rights in 1 on the character files 2. i compile 3. i run the server 4. i log in on that account and i don't show the silver crown
??I don't know what's happening??
I have a BMXSCAPE base

item.title: Change rights does not work
item.dc:creator: @ancientmage ancientmage
item.description:
@ancientmage wrote:

if some 1 logs in to yr server that you want to make mod go to char file change player rights to 1 tell them to log out for 30secs to 1min then when they log out save there file and when they log back in that should work.

hope i was some help and hope it works.
